ygData.msgSnippet: ... So far I have found one - in our Lodge of the Dead. If you go upstairs, there is one person who gave me a quest (sorry, can t remember the name). As it
ygData.messageBody:
> can someone tell me how and where i go to get a
> quest in neriak, i have
> tried the guld master and nothing, where are some

So far I have found one - in our Lodge of the Dead. If
you go upstairs, there is one person who gave me a
quest (sorry, can't remember the name). As it involves
the Lavastorm Mountains, it is beyond my abilities at
the moment, but I am patient *grin*

Tiangwyn
Level 7 SK
